    • Method Detail

      • kingFinder

        int kingFinder(int color,
               java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        help method: find king piece of either white or black
        Parameters:
        color - determine to find which color's king
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return location of selected color King (integer location on board; range from 1-64). return -1 if couldn't find King

      • clearCheckStatus

        void clearCheckStatus(java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        Clear all pieces on board check status
        Parameters:
        board - current board

      • protectKing

        boolean protectKing(int kingIndex,
                    java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        Check if current King piece is safe or not
        Parameters:
        kingIndex - integer location of King piece on board(range from: 1-64)
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return true is current King is not be checked; else return false

      • passingBy

        java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> passingBy(int kingIndex,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        Add all pieces which passed by King piece
        Parameters:
        kingIndex - integer location of King piece on board(range from: 1-64)
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return an arraylist which include all pieces passed by King

      • checkCheck

        boolean checkCheck(int kingIndex,
                   boolean display,
                   java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        Check if current piece could check enemy King
        Parameters:
        kingIndex - integer location of current piece(range from 1-64)
        display - if current piece could show up
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return true if current piece move couldn't check else print "Check" in a new line and return false

      • checkAround

        boolean checkAround(int kingIndex,
                    java.util.ArrayList<BlockNode> board)
        Check if pieces around King pieces could check the Kind
        Parameters:
        kingIndex - integer location of King piece on board(range from: 1-64)
        board - current board
        Returns:
        return true if King couldn't be checked; else return false
